<script>
// Data management system - tracking data collection progress
let dataItems = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Fisheries Production Records",
    type: "Non-Spatial (CSV)",
    source: "Ministry of Fisheries",
    status: "in-progress",
    progress: 65,
    createdDate: "2026-01-10",
    member: "John Mwase",
    description: "Annual fisheries production data including species catch volumes and economic value"
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: "Marine Protected Areas",
    type: "Spatial (Shapefile)",
    source: "Marine Conservation Commission",
    status: "completed",
    progress: 100,
    createdDate: "2025-12-15",
    member: "Sarah Banda",
    description: "Spatial boundaries and regulations for protected marine zones"
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    name: "Community Survey Data",
    type: "Non-Spatial (Excel)",
    source: "Local Communities",
    status: "not-started",
    progress: 0,
    createdDate: "2026-01-08",
    member: "Peter Chimwanda",
    description: "Community perception and socioeconomic survey responses"
  }
];

// Check authentication
function checkAuth() {
  return sessionStorage.getItem('lmsp_user') !== null;
}

// Initialize page
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const isAuth = checkAuth();
  
  if (!isAuth) {
    document.getElementById('mainContent').innerHTML = '<div style="text-align: center; padding: 40px; color: #999;"><p>Please log in to manage data.</p></div>';
    return;
  }
  
  renderDataList();
  loadDataFromStorage();
});

// Load data from localStorage
function loadDataFromStorage() {
  const saved = localStorage.getItem('lmsp_data_items');
  if (saved) {
    dataItems = JSON.parse(saved);
    renderDataList();
  }
}

// Save data to localStorage
function saveDataItems() {
  localStorage.setItem('lmsp_data_items', JSON.stringify(dataItems));
}

// Render data list
function renderDataList() {
  const container = document.getElementById('dataListContainer');
  container.innerHTML = '';
  
  dataItems.forEach(item => {
    const statusColor = item.status === 'completed' ? '#4caf50' : 
                       item.status === 'in-progress' ? '#ff9800' : '#ccc';
    const statusText = item.status === 'completed' ? 'Completed' : 
                      item.status === 'in-progress' ? 'In Progress' : 'Not Started';
    
    const card = document.createElement('div');
    card.className = 'data-card';
    card.innerHTML = `
      <div class="card-header">
        <div class="card-title">
          <h3>${item.name}</h3>
          <p class="card-meta">${item.type}  ${item.source}</p>
        </div>
        <button class="btn-edit" onclick="openEditModal(${item.id})"> Edit</button>
      </div>
      
      <div class="card-body">
        <div class="member-info">
          <strong>Member:</strong> <span>${item.member || 'N/A'}</span>
        </div>
        <div class="description-info">
          <strong>Description:</strong> <span>${item.description || 'No description'}</span>
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div class="progress-section">
        <div class="progress-info">
          <span class="status-label" style="background: ${statusColor};">${statusText}</span>
          <span class="progress-percent">${item.progress}%</span>
        </div>
        <div class="progress-bar">
          <div class="progress-fill" style="width: ${item.progress}%; background: ${statusColor};"></div>
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div class="card-footer">
        <small>Created: ${item.createdDate}</small>
        <button class="btn-delete" onclick="deleteDataItem(${item.id})"></button>
      </div>
    `;
    container.appendChild(card);
  });
}

// Open edit modal
function openEditModal(id) {
  const item = dataItems.find(d => d.id === id);
  if (!item) return;
  
  window.currentEditItem = item;
  document.getElementById('modalTitle').textContent = 'Update Data: ' + item.name;
  document.getElementById('editName').value = item.name;
  document.getElementById('editType').value = item.type;
  document.getElementById('editSource').value = item.source;
  document.getElementById('editStatus').value = item.status;
  document.getElementById('editProgress').value = item.progress;
  document.getElementById('editMember').value = item.member || '';
  document.getElementById('editDescription').value = item.description || '';
  document.getElementById('progressValue').textContent = item.progress + '%';
  
  document.getElementById('editModal').style.display = 'block';
}

// Open new data form
function openNewDataForm() {
  window.currentEditItem = null;
  document.getElementById('modalTitle').textContent = 'Add New Data';
  document.getElementById('editForm').reset();
  document.getElementById('progressValue').textContent = '0%';
  document.getElementById('editModal').style.display = 'block';
}

// Update progress value display
function updateProgressDisplay(value) {
  document.getElementById('progressValue').textContent = value + '%';
}

// Save data item
function saveDataItem() {
  const name = document.getElementById('editName').value.trim();
  const type = document.getElementById('editType').value.trim();
  const source = document.getElementById('editSource').value.trim();
  const status = document.getElementById('editStatus').value;
  const progress = parseInt(document.getElementById('editProgress').value);
  const member = document.getElementById('editMember').value.trim();
  const description = document.getElementById('editDescription').value.trim();
  
  if (!name || !type || !source || !member || !description) {
    alert('Please fill in all required fields');
    return;
  }
  
  if (window.currentEditItem) {
    // Update existing
    window.currentEditItem.name = name;
    window.currentEditItem.type = type;
    window.currentEditItem.source = source;
    window.currentEditItem.status = status;
    window.currentEditItem.progress = progress;
    window.currentEditItem.member = member;
    window.currentEditItem.description = description;
    showMessage('Data updated successfully!', 'success');
  } else {
    // Create new
    const newId = Math.max(...dataItems.map(d => d.id), 0) + 1;
    const today = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0];
    dataItems.push({
      id: newId,
      name,
      type,
      source,
      status,
      progress,
      member,
      description,
      createdDate: today
    });
    showMessage('Data added successfully!', 'success');
  }
  
  saveDataItems();
  closeModal();
  renderDataList();
}

// Delete data item
function deleteDataItem(id) {
  if (confirm('Delete this data item permanently?')) {
    dataItems = dataItems.filter(d => d.id !== id);
    saveDataItems();
    renderDataList();
    showMessage('Data deleted!', 'success');
  }
}

// Modal functions
function closeModal() {
  document.getElementById('editModal').style.display = 'none';
  window.currentEditItem = null;
}

function showMessage(msg, type) {
  const div = document.createElement('div');
  div.className = `message ${type}`;
  div.textContent = msg;
  document.body.appendChild(div);
  setTimeout(() => div.remove(), 3000);
}

// Close modal on outside click
window.onclick = function(e) {
  const modal = document.getElementById('editModal');
  if (e.target === modal) closeModal();
}
</script>

<div class="data-container">
  <div class="header-section">
    <h1> Data Management</h1>
    <p>Track and manage data collection progress for LMSP-Tanzania initiatives</p>
    <button class="btn-add" onclick="openNewDataForm()"> Add New Data</button>
  </div>
  
  <div id="mainContent">
    <div class="data-grid" id="dataListContainer"></div>
  </div>
</div>

<div id="editModal" class="modal">
  <div class="modal-content">
    <div class="modal-header">
      <h2 id="modalTitle">Add New Data</h2>
      <button class="close-btn" onclick="closeModal()">&times;</button>
    </div>
    
    <form id="editForm" onsubmit="event.preventDefault(); saveDataItem();">
      <div class="form-group">
        <label for="editName">Data Name: <span style="color: red;">*</span></label>
        <input type="text" id="editName" required placeholder="e.g., Fisheries Production Records">
      </div>
      
      <div class="form-group">
        <label for="editType">Data Type: <span style="color: red;">*</span></label>
        <select id="editType" required>
          <option value="">Select Type</option>
          <option value="Non-Spatial (CSV)">Non-Spatial (CSV)</option>
          <option value="Non-Spatial (Excel)">Non-Spatial (Excel)</option>
          <option value="Non-Spatial (JSON)">Non-Spatial (JSON)</option>
          <option value="Spatial (Shapefile)">Spatial (Shapefile)</option>
          <option value="Spatial (GeoJSON)">Spatial (GeoJSON)</option>
          <option value="Spatial (Raster)">Spatial (Raster)</option>
        </select>
      </div>
      
      <div class="form-group">
        <label for="editSource">Data Source: <span style="color: red;">*</span></label>
        <input type="text" id="editSource" required placeholder="e.g., Ministry of Fisheries">
      </div>
      
      <div class="form-group">
        <label for="editMember">Member Added: <span style="color: red;">*</span></label>
        <input type="text" id="editMember" required placeholder="e.g., John Mwase">
      </div>
      
      <div class="form-group">
        <label for="editDescription">Description: <span style="color: red;">*</span></label>
        <textarea id="editDescription" required placeholder="e.g., Annual fisheries production data including species catch volumes..." style="resize: vertical; min-height: 80px;"></textarea>
      </div>
      
      <div class="form-group">
        <label for="editCategory">Category: <span style="color: red;">*</span></label>
        <select id="editCategory" required>
          <option value="">Select Category</option>
          <option value="Administrative/Physical">Administrative/Physical</option>
          <option value="Biological">Biological</option>
          <option value="Human Use">Human Use</option>
        </select>
      </div>
      
      <div class="form-group">
        <label for="editStatus">Status: <span style="color: red;">*</span></label>
        <select id="editStatus" required>
          <option value="not-started">Not Started</option>
          <option value="in-progress">In Progress</option>
          <option value="completed">Completed</option>
        </select>
      </div>
      
      <div class="form-group">
        <label for="editProgress">Progress: <span style="color: red;">*</span></label>
        <div class="progress-input-group">
          <input type="range" id="editProgress" min="0" max="100" value="0" 
                 onchange="updateProgressDisplay(this.value)" 
                 oninput="updateProgressDisplay(this.value)">
          <span id="progressValue">0%</span>
        </div>
      </div>
      
      <div class="form-buttons">
        <button type="button" class="btn-cancel" onclick="closeModal()">Cancel</button>
        <button type="submit" class="btn-save"> Save Data</button>
      </div>
